property.name: cache.manager.impl
property.description: Inner cache manager,default DefaultCacheManager.The AyncCacheManager writes local disk asynchronous.

property.name: storage.adapter.impl
property.description: Storage adapter implements class.It can use this parameter to supports many storages.

property.name: storage.repository.mode
property.description: There is 3 mode.0 express memory storage and file storage,1 express file storage only,2 express some categories storage at file,and other storage at memory

property.name: memory.cache.categories
property.description: This paramter can be used by storage repository mode is 2

property.name: cache.file.name.format
property.description: There is 3 cache file name format.0 express 5 min generate one file,1 express 10 min generate one file,2 express one hour generate one file

property.name: hdfs.buffer.size
property.description: The buffer size of HDFS client write file(KB).

property.name: batch.commit.size
property.description: The count of HDFS client batch commit log.

property.name: storage.type
property.description: The type of xlog storage system.

property.name: storage.replication
property.description: The replication of data storage,default is 3

property.name: storage.repository.queue.capacity
property.description: The capacity of repository queue

property.name: ice.message.size.max
property.description: ICE framework receiver message package max size(KB).

property.name: web.server.host
property.description: Web server ip,default automatic to get ip.

property.name: categories.list.file.check.interval
property.description: The number of seconds between two periodic check categories list file.

property.name: dfs.socket.timeout
property.description: The number of seconds for dfs client connect hdfs timeout.

property.name: error.data.sync.thread.count
property.description: Thread count dispatcher sync fail data.

property.name: slot.replication
property.description: The dispacher connection count at zookeeper dispatcher node

property.name: storage.version
property.description: The version of xlog storage system

property.name: storage.uri
property.description: The address of xlog storage system.

property.name: zookeeper.connstr
property.description: The address of zookeeper.eg,host:port,host2,port2,...

property.name: oplog.store.path
property.description: The path of xlog dispatcher local cache data

property.name: oplog.sync.interval
property.description: The number of seconds between two periodic synchronized fail data to storage

property.name: oplog.clear.interval
property.description: The number of seconds between two periodic clear data.

property.name: local.store.cache.time
property.description: The number of minutes for local store cache data.

property.name: error.data.cache.time
property.description: The number of minutes for fail data period of validity at local disk cache.

property.name: master.start.delay
property.description: The number of seconds for dispatcher master do balance when dispatcher start.

property.name: zk.session.timeout
property.description: The number of seconds for zookeeper session timeout.

property.name: web.server.port
property.description: Dispatcher web server port

property.name: system.administrator
property.description: dispatcher administrator info.eg,username:id,username2:id2

property.name: xlog.uuid
property.description: Dispatcher unique id

property.name: mobilepone.warning.number
property.description: The comma of mobilephone number for warning.

property.name: queue.used.ration.warning.threshold
property.description: The ration threshold of storage queue which will be warning

property.name: request.failure.max.timeout
property.description: The number of seconds send request failure max timeout
